error.message: Call to deprecated method assertFieldByXPath() of class Drupal\Tests\BrowserTestBase. Deprecated in drupal:8.3.0 and is removed from drupal:10.0.0. Use $this->xpath() instead and check the values directly in the test.
Value of core_version_requirement: ^8 || ^9 is not compatible with the next major version of Drupal core. See https://drupal.org/node/3070687.
